CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK( "https://"&IF( CONTAINS(QBO_Org_Name__c , "Sandbox Company"), "sandbox." ,"") &"qbo.intuit.com/app/"& CASE( Type__c,
'Credit Memo', "creditmemo?txnId="&RIGHT( QB_External_Id__c ,(LEN(QB_External_Id__c )-FIND('-CM-', Invoice_Id__c) - 3 )),
'Sales Receipt', "salesreceipt?txnId="&RIGHT(QB_External_Id__c ,(LEN(QB_External_Id__c )-FIND('-SR-', Invoice_Id__c)- 3)),
'Refund Receipt', "refundreceipt?txnId="&RIGHT(QB_External_Id__c ,(LEN(QB_External_Id__c )-FIND('-RR-', Invoice_Id__c)- 3)),
"invoice?txnId="&(QB_External_Id__c)
), "Click Here" )
CustomField.label: See this Invoice in QuickBooks
